edu.wpi.disco.lang
Class SayEval

java.lang.Object
  edu.wpi.cetask.Task
      edu.wpi.cetask.Decomposition.Step
          edu.wpi.disco.lang.Utterance
              edu.wpi.disco.lang.Say
                  edu.wpi.disco.lang.SayEval

public class SayEval
extends Say

Builtin utterance for agent utterance with associated script to evaluate. This is just a convenience to avoid needing to define a new task type to attach a grounding script.
